oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Efficacy of Surround® WP against the European pear psyllid (Cacosylla pyri) in large-scale field trials
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Daniel, Claudia
Wyss, Eric
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Are pre-flowering applications of Surround® WP sufficient to keep the European pear psyllid (Cacopsylla pyri) below the economic threshold for the whole season?
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Daniel, Claudia and Wyss, Eric (2003) Efficacy of Surround® WP against the European pear psyllid (Cacosylla pyri) in large-scale field trials. Research Institute of Organic Agriculture (FIBL), CH-Frick, Pflanzenschutz: Schädlinge, Nützlinge.
